name: gracie the guinea pig
description:
<div align="justify">meet gracie! gracie is gibby's younger sister & is so excited to join the lost.marbles family. gracie is your typical girly-girl, affectionate & kind.

gracie likes: making up song & dance routines in the carport, watching pink sunsets with her dad, & eating watermelon. she loves spending time with her brother gibby.

gracie dislikes: having her hair washed, & learning her times tables. she doesn't like creepy crawlies, especially spiders, or when her mum cooks her carrots in honey. 

gracie is made of cute spotty cotton & white broderie anglaise. she has a pretty little lace detail under her front paws (told her she was a girly girl!). her eyes & ears are felt, & her nose & mouth are hand embroidered. like gibby, gracie is generously stuffed with polyfil, & ready for you to take home. enjoy her!

name: gibby the guinea pig
description:
<div align="justify">meet gibby! gibby & his sister gracie have been having a great time supervising my sewing table, but have finally made their way on to lost.marbles. hooray!

gibby likes: eating leftovers, watching icarly, & holding lemonade stands on the pavement with gracie. he loves pb&j sandwiches, sunny days, & when he can read street signs. 

gibby dislikes: getting splinters, high pitched noises, cranberries & getting carsick. he also doesn't like it when gracie kisses him in public. as far as little sisters go she's pretty good, but hey, gibby has street cred to protect.

gibby is made of beautiful spotted cotton, grey corduroy & vintage mattress ticking. his eyes & ears are felt & his face has been hand embroidered. generously stuffed with polyfil, gibby is perfect for cuddles or to rest little heads on during naps or long car trips. take care of him for me!

name: ali the super nurse
description: meet ali! ali is the newest member to the lost.marbles family, though she wants you to know she certainly hasn't lost her marbles. far from it, in fact, ali is a super nurse! she hears baxter pumps from a million paces, always writes contemporaneous patient notes, & is well known for her ability to vaccinate small children with neither a cry or a tear being shed. ali likes: checking the resus trolley, courteous doctors, organising her first aid kit, & writing her shifts neatly in her diary. ali dislikes: chapped lips, doctors who don't wash their hands or their equipment between patients, & hitting the duress button under the desk with her knee accidentally (although she does it so often the guys in security make a game of it). she is made of a combination of cotton, starched linen, & wool-blend felt. complete with little felt mary janes & a felt cape, ali the super nurse will be sure to take care of you whenever you are sick - & even when you're not!

name: mcdreamy the neurosurgeon
description:
mcdreamy, wearing his favourite pair of scrubs & his surgical mask, is made of a mixture of soft cotton & wool blend felt. he wears a removable scrub cap (because he has amazing hair), & his gown is removable via a press stud, though he'd prefer if you left him dressed! he may be very handsome, but he's also rather modest.

mcdreamy likes: falling asleep in his caravan in the woods, a nine blade scalpel, excellent coffee. he dislikes mosquitos, nicking aneurysms, & being stuck in traffic. 

mcdreamy comes with a spare scrub cap in case he's having a bad day & needs a change. who wants to take him home!?

name: nate the surfer boy
description:
<div align="justify">name: nate the surfer boy

likes: listening to the beach boys, early mornings surfs with his mates, chai lattes (don't tell anyone) & good quality beach towels.

dislikes: water pollution, sand in his bedsheets, & having to wear shoes.

nate, with his shaggy blonde hair, cut off jeans & hawaiian shirt, sets an example of sun protection with his zinc-striped face. (remember, tanning = skin cells in trauma!). he is made of cotton, with wool felt used for his hair, cheeks & zinc. 

who is ready to chill out with the cutest surfer on the beach?

name: carson the emo boy
description:
<div align="justify">name: carson the emo boy

likes: myspace over facebook, hair products, my chemical romance & writing poetry

dislikes: getting sunburnt, his mum telling him to 'cut his fringe', early mornings & conflict 

carson is made from clean, recycled fabric. arms, legs & face are cotton, & his shirt is made of flannelette. his hair & cheeks are made of wool felt. facial features are hand embroidered.

 carson can't wait for you to take him home!

name: lee-roy the studious boy
description:
<div align="justify">lee-roy the studious boy

likes: homework, the library, quiz shows, skinny legged jeans and office works

dislikes: pupil free days, rugby league and when people toilet paper his locker

lee-roy is made of clean, recycled fabric. his body is made of cotton, blue denim and wool felt for his hair and spunky tie. if you need motivation to study, you definitely need lee-roy. i promise he'll be a good influence!

name: fantastic fox
description:
<div align="justify">fantastic fox is one of my favourites. he's a gentle little guy who likes to read the newspaper, make cups of tea, & chase the odd chicken in the yard. he'd never eat them, of course, just so you know. he's always quick to remind everyone that he's 'just having a bit of fun.'

fantastic fox is made of clean, recycled tweed trousers. the fabric is nice & thick, perfect for snuggling or simply sitting on the couch keeping it warm for you while you're at work. his eyes, ears & little nose are all wool felt, attached with a mixture of hand & machine embroidering.

you won't regret taking fantastic fox home; in fact, you won't know what you did without him.

name: frankie the farm-hand
description:
<div align="justify">frankie is one of the happiest fellows you will ever meet. he wakes up early to start his work with the animals on the farm, & doesn't stop smiling until he falls back asleep at night. definitely someone you need in your life!

frankie is made of cotton, with cute denim shorts & braces to keep his duds up. he has red buttons adorning his shorts front & back. frankie's face is wool felt, with facial features hand embroidered & outlined in simple blanket stitch. he is stuffed with polyfill. 

if you are buying frankie for a baby or small child, please let me know & i will be happy to replace the buttons with felt to avoid a choking hazard.

name: lila the hedge-hog
description:
<div align="justify">lila the hedge-hog is a sleepy little critter who loves nothing more than being cuddled. she rarely makes noise, apart from when she's lonely in which case she may emit a tiny squeak!

she is made of beautiful, soft corduroy for her body, wool felt for her face & limbs, & pretty floral cotton for her tummy. all felt has been machine stitched on, & her eyes are hand embroidered.

the differing textures on lila make her perfect for babies or small children. however, if you are purchasing this for a child, please let me know & i will embroider her little nose rather than using the button which may present a choking hazard. 

who is going to give pretty little lila a new home?

name: belle the hedge-hog
description:
<div align="justify">belle the hedge-hog is a cheeky little critter who always tries to stay up past her bed time. luckily her sister, lila, looks out for her & makes sure she's in bed when she's supposed to be!

belle is made of beautiful, soft corduroy for her body, wool felt for her face & limbs, & a scrap of pink striped vintage fabric for her tummy. all felt is machine embroidered on. 

because of the different textures of all the fabric, belle is ideal for babies or small children. however, if you a purchasing this item for a child, please let me know & i will embroider the nose in lieu of the button as it may present a choking hazard. 

who is ready for a cheeky little addition to their home?

name: emma
description:
emma...what to say about emma. emma is a little firecracker. she is rather hyperactive & sometimes a touch naughty. still, she is quick to apologise & responds very well to time-outs. phew!

emma likes: jumping on the couch, glitter & playing dress-ups with her two kittens. 

emma dislikes: watching the news, making her bed & having to eat broccoli. 

made of super cute girly cottons & wool felt, emma is the perfect little friend for snuggles or chats. she has a neat pink ribbon on her ear & is stuffed with polyfill.

name: patrick
description:
<div align="justify">patrick is a sweet little guy, closely related to frankie the farm hand. i think they might actually be cousins. patrick likes: reading, peanut butter sandwiches, & catching insects. he dislikes: baths, green beans & bullies. quite a sensible guy, really, don't you think?

patrick is made of cotton & wears cute denim shorts. his face is made of black wool felt, with facial features hand embroidered. he is stuffed with polyfill.

name: rosie rabbit
description:
<div align="justify">rosie is a quiet little girl, who likes ballet, going on picnics & watching the clouds. 

rosie is made of cotton & stuffed with polyfill. she is the perfect size for little hands, & has a rattle inside for extra fun. her face is hand stitched on wool felt, & machine stitched to the body. 

like all good bunnies, rosie has many siblings. they will be up on the site soon. if you would like one of her brothers or sisters in a certain colour, let me know.

name: eddie the elephant
description:
<div align="justify">eddie was always teased for being small for his age - quite an insult if you are an elephant! however he has since learned to live with his small stature & loves to make the most of it. eddie's favourite thing to do is take naps in tea cups. preferably empty tea cups, but he's not averse to bathing in milky tea if necessary. 

eddie is made of the softest flannelette & is the perfect size for small hands to snuggle. his gusset allows him to stand nice & tall. his ears are hand stitched, as are his eyes. 

keep watch as some of eddie's family will become available on the site soon.
